nodes.text: Thaereian Intelligence was the intelligence division of the Thaereian military.

During the time of the Clone Wars, the Thaereian Intelligence agent Xirossk passed through the space station Burnout whilst on an assignment, and learnt that the military were supporting gladiatorial fights on the station involving unwilling participants. He spotted the Heroes of Cularin on the station and planned to inform them of the gladiator fights, so that they would help him defect from the military. Xirossk made contact with the heroes, but the Defel Thaereian Intelligence agent Ta'Veel secretly monitored their encounter, and contacted his superiors about it.
